name: Poongoons
description:
Poongoons is a party snowball fight game in Antarctica! Play as penguins, don't get hit and try to throw snowballs in other player's faces >:D

Fight on different antarctic research stations and wreck your friends in this local multiplayer party game. All you need is two or more controllers and then the fun can begin!

Mac build is provided but untested, if you see any bug, please report to us :)

There is no audio yet. Also no winning condition. Also, did we mention this is pre-alpha? Have fun testing anyway :)
